channel.title: Using Particle Systems :: K-State CIS 580 Textbook
channel.description: Now that we’ve defined some example particle systems, let’s see how we can put them into use. Adding Rain Let’s start with our RainParticleSystem, and add rain that runs down the screen. Since we don’t need to start/stop the rain for this simple example, all we need to do is construct the particle system and add it to the Game.Components list in the Game.Initialize() method: RainParticleSystem rain = new RainParticleSystem(this, new Rectangle(100, -10, 500, 10)); Components.
